system.requirements: Tau, Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire), Common Lore (War)
system.effect: The explorer can spend a Fate Point to Automatically suceed on any Tech-Use Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to their Intelligence Bonus.

description.value: The explorer can spend a Fate Point to Automatically suceed on any Tech-Use Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to their Intelligence Bonus.
